roleset.name: move rapidly and lightly
roleset.note: FLICK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flick' based on sentences in brown. (from flick.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with path
example.text: Greg's eyes flicked up from his instrument panel.

example.name: with cause
example.text: He nodded, [*-1] clasping and unclasping his hands over his paunch, and flicked glances at me.

example.name: cause, no path
example.text: I pulled the throttle of the tractor in and out, hoping to frighten him with the noise, but the snake only flicked its black, forked tongue and faced the huge tractor wheel, without fright or concern.

roleset.name: touch rapidly and lightly
roleset.note: FLICK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flick' based on sentences in brown. (from flick.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: flick off
example.text: There was a sound like the one you-1 produce [*T*-1] by [*]-1 flicking a watermelon with your finger, only louder, and Pops fell forward from the waist and then over sidewise.

roleset.name: produce an effect with rapid light motion
roleset.note: FLICK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flick' based on sentences in brown. (from flick.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: flick lights
example.text: And I had hardly finished my business in the toilet on the aforementioned occasion when the lights in that place, like the hall lights controlled from the switch in the office, flicked off and on impatiently.
example.arg: the lights in that place, like the lights controlled from the switch in the office
